data.title: Janne Nilsen on LinkedIn: Empowerment allows you to fail fast, learn faster and adapt to change
data.meta_description:
Are you empowered to fail and take risks?
I’m fortunate to have trust-based leadership around me, which gives me freedom to fail, grow and challenge status… | 10 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Did you know that 2% of Siemens is owned by "Norway"? Norges Bank Investment Management own 25 billion NOK worth of it, which is 5000 NOK per Norwegian. The CEO of the largest single investor in the world, Norges Bank Investment Management, interviews leaders of some of the largest companies in the world. Recently, he talked to Roland Busch, which gives you a great insight to what our technology company is all about, and the mindset of the people 🧠 Highly recommend it for both learning and inspiration 🙏 ▶ Tune in, if you want to understand how excisting and new technology transform the everyday, and to hear some of the biggest challenges in balancing this in the market. From 16.30, you will also get more personal thoughts about the culture and mindset, talent development and Rolands career😄 💡 More about Siemens: https://lnkd.in/d8MNDKAN 💡 About the Norwegian Government Pension Fund Global: https://lnkd.in/djYTT8ru

If you want to understand better how the industry is changing, this is by far one of the best articles I read💡👇 Very good examples of "why and how" the technology development is shifting. Thank you for making alot of complex topics an easy read, Rainer Brehm🙏

I'm happy to share that I have moved to Copenhagen and started a new Head Quarter position in Siemens😄 I will be working as a Business Developement Manager with TIA-systems, and can't wait to support the acceleration of digital transformation in Europe North🚀 A big thank you to all colleagues, customers and partners I've worked with in Siemens Norway the last four years! I'm very grateful for the opportunity I had to grow in Siemens, and to work with inspiring industry companies that push new limits🚀😄 ' #siemens #digitaltransformation #thankyou
